ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "After students complete the online application, please take a printout of the filled application form. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Gather all the required documents as specified in the application process and submit the hard copies of the application form and supporting documents to your respective college. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "College principals and inspection officers will review the application and documents submitted by the student. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "They will verify the information provided and ensure that all required documents are in order.

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The college principal will provide information about the selected student's attendance, confirming that it meets the minimum requirement of 75%. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "This attendance information will be uploaded by the Taluk Backward Classes Welfare Officer through the online portal. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Based on the respective year's budget, the qualified students will be approved at the taluk level for the Vidyasiri-Food and Accommodation Scholarship. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Grants will be allocated according to category-wise reservations and the Merit cum Means criteria.
